channel.title: Wounding Response on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Wounding Response on funPlantGenes

item.title: HbPLT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HbPLT1 Gene Name: putative polyol transporter protein 1 Genome: Species: Hevea brasiliensis Functional Descriptions: Screening a latex-derived cDNA library using polyol transporter-specific probes, two full-length cDNAs were isolated, and named HbPLT1 and HbPLT2 (for Hevea brasiliensis polyol transporter 1 and 2, respectively).

item.title: HbPLT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HbPLT2 Gene Name: putative polyol transporter protein 2 Genome: Species: Hevea brasiliensis Functional Descriptions: Screening a latex-derived cDNA library using polyol transporter-specific probes, two full-length cDNAs were isolated, and named HbPLT1 and HbPLT2 (for Hevea brasiliensis polyol transporter 1 and 2, respectively).

item.title: LeGGPS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeGGPS1 Gene Name: geranylgeranyl pyrophosphate synthase1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: LeGGPS1 was predominantly expressed in leaf tissue and LeGGPS2 in ripening fruit and flower tissue.

item.title: OsMKK4;LARGE11
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g54600 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0787300 Gene Symbol: OsMKK4 LARGE11 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsMPK1;OsMAPK6
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g06090 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0154500 Gene Symbol: OsMPK1 OsMAPK6 OsSIPK Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsWRKY53
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os05g27730 RAPdb gene ID: Os05g0343400 Gene Symbol: OsWRKY53 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PhBPBT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhBPBT Gene Name: benzoyl CoA:benzyl alcohol/phenylethanol benzoyltransferase Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Tissue-specific PhBPBT expression is differentially regulated in response to endogenous ethylene.

item.title: PORK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g123860 Gene Symbol: PORK1 Gene Name: PEPR1/2 ORTHOLOG RECEPTOR-LIKE KINASE1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: PORK1 Is Required for Tomato Seedling Growth Response to Systemin Peptide.

item.title: PtaZFP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtaZFP2 Gene Name: Cys2/His2 zinc finger protein Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus alba Functional Descriptions: A single bending modified plant diameter growth and increased the relative abundance of PtaZFP2 transcripts.

item.title: PvLOX6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PvLOX6 Gene Name: Lipoxygenase 6 Genome: Species: Phaseolus vulgaris Functional Descriptions: Isolated the cDNA of a novel chloroplast-targeted Phaseolus vulgaris LOX, (PvLOX6).

item.title: Zmlox4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb054050 Gene Symbol: Zmlox4 Gene Name: lipoxygenase4 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: ZmPAO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZmPAO Gene Name: polyamine oxidase Genome: Species: Zea mays Functional Descriptions: Maize (Zea mays) PAO (ZmPAO) is a developmentally regulated flavoprotein abundant in primary and secondary cell walls of several tissues.
